title.value: Preliminary estimation of application of mulch materials in near-bush strip of plantings of remontant raspberry
Предварительная оценка применения мульчирующих материалов в прикустовой полосе наса-ждений малины ремонтантной

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Krivorot, A.M., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: The article presents results of research during 2011–2012 into the efficiency of application of mulch materials in plantings of remontant raspberries. We have established that the content of near-bush strip of plantings of remontant raspberry with the application of flax fiber as mulch material ensures yield increase of 30 %, increases average weight of berries in comparison with the control one by 17.4–26.0 %, as well as helps to reduce infestation of near-bush strip by 73.7 %.
